name: Joe Swanson's Basement
description:
You play as Peter, after a night of boozing at The Drunken Clam. You're about to open the door of your car when you get hit on the head and pass out. You awaken in Joe's Basement, and must collect 10 bottles of Pawtucket Patriot Ale to be let out of Joe's basement. But don't let Joe find you without all those beer bottles, otherwise he'll break your legs...

**3 Difficulties** 

Nerd, Average Child, and Pro Gamer mode!

Joe Swanson is a character owned by Family Guy, I do not claim to be the creator or an affiliate of Family Guy or Joe Swanson or anything seen in game.
